text: Ani tyancyata asedekhila aheta, je paigambarala duhkha yatana pohacavitata ani mhanatata ki halakya kanaca ahe (tumhi) sanga, ki to kana tumacya bhala'isathi ahe. To allahavara imana rakhato ani imanadharakancya bolanyavara visvasa thevato ani tumacyapaiki je imanadharaka aheta, he tyancyasathi daya krpa aheta ani allahace rasula yanna je loka duhkha yatana pohacavitata, tyancyasathi duhkhadayaka azaba (siksa-yatana) ahe
